name: XMAS TRAIN
description:
A quick little puzzle game created for TOYBOXJAM2020! I started from the assets provided as part of the jam here: https://itch.io/jam/toy-box-jam-2020

You can play it online here: http://altereddreams.net/files/programs/xmastrain/

This project was a ton of fun, I really want to make something holiday themed since I was trapped at home this year. Hopefully it is a fun little diversion.
